taxonomicnotes: The species is the type species of the genus, first described by Gould, 1847.
rationale: This species is assessed as Least Concern because although it has a restricted range, at present there are no threats and it is abundant where found. Conservation actions include the implementation of catchment management plans to keep the river water well oxygenated and clean.
evaluator: Sri-aroon, P., Burch, J. & Seddon, M.
